<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hag Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1334) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic. Choose one common spell of 4th level or lower from those available to a coven, including the spells contributed to a coven by a hag of your mother's type. You can cast this spell once per day as a 4th-level occult innate spell.

 Spells available to all covens are [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [_dream message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), and [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159). The eligible spells granted by the most prominent types of hag are: **Sea Hag** [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371); **Green Hag** [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [_outcast's curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=211), [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=366); **Annis Hag** [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94); **Night Hag** [_nightmare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=208)
name: Hag Magic
